doc.field: BROCKWAY AIR TO BUY FIVE SAAB PLANES

The U.S. Airline Brockway Air, a subsidiary of Brockway Inc>, has signed an agreement with Saab-Scania AB SABS ST> to buy five 34-seater Saab SF340 aircraft for an undisclosed price, with an option on a further five, Saab said. All five will be delivered to the Burlington, Vermont-based airline this year for use on Brockway's 22-city service system. Saab said it now had 103 firm orders for the regional SF340, 80 of which had already been delivered. REUTER
